message.body: happy valentine's day!
Thank you!! I'm sorry I just saw this.
how are you? how's everything going?
Ok thanks for asking..just waiting on $$ and trying to get this house in order.
did you meet up with your med asst friend?
Today thank god..drinks at 6 so you should come by here tomorrow if kens working..if not sun. He doesn't know
cool. just lemme know. mum's the word.
Totally I will. :). Did you have a nice vday??
no. it just reminded me / re-enforced why i hate her and how unhealthy for me living here is.
I totally understand. I told KJH NO GIFTS, nothing special..since we can't afford it, but mostly it's Xmas then my bday then vday..just too much. So e
..without pressure for either of us no arguing or expectations. It was so different and lovely. Never pressure again on this day.
ven though I hoped for a little special surprise I was totally OK and we got cheap burgers from the habit watched a movie and went to bed. It was lovely
BUT he DID let me tag him in a post as my person yesterday so that was nice.

i bought her lunch and coffee, then she came home to 2doz roses and a pound of chocolate.
she gave me a kiss on the cheek and conversation hearts.
Wow. Well lets find the bright side here..at least she did not scream at you for the flowers being the wrong color. And she's more than welcome to send
the chocolate THIS way..if I could I'd buy myself a heart shaped box today as they will be on sale!!
Well, acceptance is the first step in acknowledging you have a problem.
1st step achieved.
I'll call you later..phones going to die..charging.
cool.
